messages.subject: Re: The Cartoon History of the Universe
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/15/03 5:07:44 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... The author has a website.   Larry Gonick n case that
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/15/03 5:07:44 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

> It's called The Cartoon History of the Universe by Larry Gonick (or Gonnick)
> It's funny, irreverent, and easy to read. A kid might not get all the
> jokes
> and stuff at first, but that wouldn't matter.
>

The author has a website. <A HREF="http://www.larrygonick.com/">Larry Gonick</A> n case that did not appear as a
link, it's <A HREF="http://www.larrygonick.com/">http://www.larrygonick.com/</A>

Wendy in FL
